document.full_text: to assist his native japan, ryo ishikawa said he will donate his entire tournament earnings this year ' plus a bonus for every birdie he makes ' toward relief efforts.
document.title: ishikawa to give 2011 earnings to japan victims
lines_and_colors: to assist his native japan, ryo ishikawa said he will donate his entire tournament earnings this year ' plus a bonus for every birdie he makes ' toward relief efforts.
